channel.title: Dupe fix
channel.description: ok well the problem is when people stake in the duel arena they go to the duel arena and xlog during the coutndown then that player that x logs keeps his items and the so called "winner" gets the item as well. i fixed it so you can not logout in the game but you can still xlog how do i make it where if you logout you loose duel or something? i use a pi base

item.title: Dupe fix
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Wherever the case is for dual starting put
Blah blah duel starting
C.playerLogout =false

Read full topic

easy fix simple make them enter combat + teleblock them should solve any issues
